content.raw:
Once this is in, does it mean gazebo will be able to use whatever ign-msgs version ign-transport is using? 
In that case, on pull request #2420, we don't need to find the ign-msgs package anymore, right? 
Is this something we would want to do, rely on the version pulled by ign-transport?
